info.title: üìä Before/After Comparison:
info.success_desc: High blue peaks (power) with low red background (electricity price) = high load in cheap period ‚úì
info.shift_desc: Visible shift between gray and blue line shows the load shifting that occurred!

timeline.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Process Timeline Matrix (Time √ó Machine)
timeline.tip: üí° Tip: Hover over a process for detailed information. The Y-axis shows the different machines, the X-axis shows time.

auftraege.title: üìã Optimized Production Plan
auftraege.description: Orders have been arranged in an energy cost-optimized manner.

strategie.title: üéØ Applied Optimization Strategy: Cost Minimization
strategie.ziel: Goal: Maximum energy cost savings through optimal shifting of ALL orders into cheap time windows
strategie.alle_auftraege: ALL orders are sorted by cheapest electricity price and shifted to the cheapest available time windows
strategie.priorisierung: Prioritization: Orders with higher energy first to achieve maximum cost savings
strategie.visualisierung: Visualization: In the chart you see high blue peaks (all loads) with low red electricity price = successful optimization!
strategie.demand_response: Demand Response Compensation: 50% of control amount for avoided load in high-price periods
strategie.flexibilitaet: Flexibility Premium: 80% of power price for provided load shifting (kW)
strategie.mindestkriterium: Minimum Criterion: Optimization is only executed with >5% cost savings
strategie.constraints: Technical Constraints: 15 min setup time for material change, 20 min warm-up time considered

alerts.optimization_success: ‚úÖ Optimization successful! Energy costs reduced by {percent}% ({amount} ‚Ç¨ saved)
alerts.optimization_success_detail: All {count} orders were shifted to the cheapest available time windows
alerts.optimization_insufficient: ‚ö†Ô∏è Optimization yielded only {percent}% savings ({amount} ‚Ç¨). At least 5% required. Please adjust electricity prices or maintain production.
